<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
    <message id="injectListJSON" name="injectListJSON"/>
    <process id="emailMyChangesTmp" name="Email My Changes Tmp" isExecutable="true">
        <startEvent id="startevent1" name="Start"/>
        <endEvent id="endevent1" name="End">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:executionListener event="start" class="plugins.SnapShot">
                    <activiti:field name="recordType">
                        <activiti:string>End_AppStartProxy</activiti:string>
                    </activiti:field>
                </activiti:executionListener>
            </extensionElements>
        </endEvent>
        <scriptTask id="listShares" name="List User Shares" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************
//******************* get list of shares of the current users with types Ids from GET calls *****
package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.GET
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get List of shares
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

//Get list of shares
pointflow.request( GET, JSON ) {
    uri.path = '/apidoc/shares/list'
    uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey]
    //println("URI " + uri)

    response.success = {sharesResp, sharesJson ->
        //println("success resp:" + sharesResp)
        sharesListJson = new groovy.json.JsonBuilder(sharesJson.get('RESPONSE').get('RESULT'))
        execution.setVariable('sharesList', sharesListJson.toString())
    }
    response.failure = { sharesResp ->
        //println("failure resp:" + sharesResp)
    }
}


//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <scriptTask id="getTypeId" name="Get Shares TypeId" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************
//******************* get list of shares of the current users with types Ids from GET calls *****
package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.GET
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get List of shares
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

def sharesListJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("sharesList"))

//For each share, get the typeId with the shareid and add it to the share info
sharesListJson.each{ share ->
    println("SHARE " + share)
    
    siteId = share.get('siteId')

    pointflow.request( GET, JSON ) {
        uri.path = '/apidoc/sites/' + siteId
        uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey]
        println("URI " + uri)

        response.success = {siteResp, siteJson ->
            println("success resp:" + siteJson)
            def siteTypeId = new groovy.json.JsonBuilder(siteJson.get('RESPONSE').get('RESULT').get('typeId'))

            share['typeId'] = siteTypeId.toString()
        }

        response.failure = { siteResp ->
            println("failure resp:" + siteResp)
        }
    }
}

execution.setVariable("sharesList", JsonOutput.toJson(sharesListJson))</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow3" sourceRef="listShares" targetRef="getTypeId"/>
        <scriptTask id="findOneDrive" name="Find OneDrive Share" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//Find the OneDrive share in the shareList (typeid = 53)

//INPUT 'sharesList'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

def sharesListJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("sharesList"))
def oneDriveShare = sharesListJson.find{ share -> share.typeId == "53"}

String oneDriveShareString = JsonOutput.toJson(oneDriveShare)

if (oneDriveShareString == null){
    execution.setVariable('oneDriveShareFound', false)
} else {
    execution.setVariable('oneDriveShareFound', true)
    execution.setVariable('oneDriveShare', oneDriveShareString)
}

//OUTPUT 'oneDriveShare'

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow5" sourceRef="getTypeId" targetRef="findOneDrive"/>
        <scriptTask id="findMatterWorklist" name="Find Matter Worklist Folder" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//List the OneDrive share root to find MatterWorklist folder

//INPUT: 'oneDriveShare'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.GET
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get the OneDrive share
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

def oneDriveJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("oneDriveShare"))
def oneDriveId = oneDriveJson.get('id')


//List root of OneDrive share
pointflow.request( GET, JSON ) {
    uri.path = '/apidoc/folders/list/' + oneDriveJson.get('id')
    uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey]
    println("URI " + uri)

    response.success = {rootResp, rootJson ->
        println("success resp:" + rootJson)

        def rootListJson = rootJson['RESPONSE']['RESULT']

        def matterWorklistFolder = rootListJson.find{ folder -> folder.type == "DIR" && folder.name == "MatterWorklist" }

        if (matterWorklistFolder == null){
            execution.setVariable('matterWorklistFolderFound', false)
        } else {
            execution.setVariable('matterWorklistFolderFound', true)
            execution.setVariable("matterWorklistFolder", JsonOutput.toJson(matterWorklistFolder))
        }

    }

    response.failure = { rootResp ->
        println("failure resp:" + rootResp)
        execution.setVariable('matterWorklistFolderFound', false)
    }
    
}

//OUTPUT: 'matterWorklistFolder'

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow6" sourceRef="findOneDrive" targetRef="exclusivegateway1"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow7" sourceRef="findMatterWorklist" targetRef="exclusivegateway2"/>
        <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway1" name="Exclusive Gateway"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow8" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" targetRef="findTmp">

        </sequenceFlow>
        <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway2" name="Exclusive Gateway"/>
        <endEvent id="endevent2" name="End"/>
        <endEvent id="endevent3" name="End"/>

            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${!oneDriveShareFound}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>

            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${!matterWorklistFolderFound}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>
        <serviceTask id="flatListFiles" name="Flat List Files" activiti:class="plugins.synchronisation_v2.wf_FlatListFiles">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="wf_assignee">
                    <activiti:expression>${wf_currentAssignee}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="wf_currentSessionKey">
                    <activiti:expression>${wf_origSessionKey}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>

                    <activiti:string>true</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="wf_listOfFolders">
                    <activiti:expression>${wf_listOfFolders}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="wf_origServer">
                    <activiti:expression>${wf_origServer}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow12" sourceRef="exclusivegateway2" targetRef="findWorksite">
            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${matterWorklistFolderFound}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>
        <scriptTask id="buildList" name="Build List Of Folders" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//Build the wf_listOfFolders variables for flat files listing 

//INPUT: 'matterWorklistFolder', 'worksiteShare'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get List of shares
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

def matterWorklistJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("matterWorklistFolder"))
def worksiteShareJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("worksiteShare"))
//folderShareid, folderName, folderContainerid, folderPath
String wf_listOfFolders = worksiteShareJson.get("id").toString() + ",MatterWorklist,_Matter Worklist," + matterWorklistJson.get("shareid").toString() + "," + matterWorklistJson.get("name").toString() + "," + matterWorklistJson.get("containerid").toString() + "," + matterWorklistJson.get("path").toString() + ";"

execution.setVariable('wf_listOfFolders', wf_listOfFolders)

//OUTPUT 'wf_listOfFolders'

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow14" sourceRef="buildList" targetRef="flatListFiles"/>
        <scriptTask id="deleteMatterWorklist" name="Delete Matter Worklist" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//Delete the matter worklist folder

//INPUT: 'matterWorklistFolder'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.DELETE
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get the Matter Worklist informations
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

def matterWorklistJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("matterWorklistFolder"))
def matterWorklistshareid = matterWorklistJson.get('shareid')
def matterWorklistcontainerid = matterWorklistJson.get('containerid')
def matterWorklistpath = matterWorklistJson.get('path')


//Delete the matter worklist folder
pointflow.request( DELETE, JSON ) {
    uri.path = '/apidoc/folders/delete/' + matterWorklistshareid
    uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey, containerid:matterWorklistcontainerid, path:matterWorklistpath]
    println("URI " + uri)

    response.success = {rootResp, rootJson ->
        println("success resp:" + rootJson)
    }

    response.failure = { rootResp ->
        println("failure resp:" + rootResp)
    }
    
}

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow19" sourceRef="flatListFiles" targetRef="deleteMatterWorklist"/>
        <scriptTask id="findWorksite" name="Find Worksite Share" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//Find the Worksite share in the shareList (typeid = 51)

//INPUT 'sharesList'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

def sharesListJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("sharesList"))
def worksiteShare = sharesListJson.find{ share -> share.typeId == "51"}

String worksiteShareString = JsonOutput.toJson(worksiteShare)

if (worksiteShareString == null){
    execution.setVariable('worksiteShareFound', false)
} else {
    execution.setVariable('worksiteShareFound', true)
    execution.setVariable('worksiteShare', worksiteShareString)
}

//OUTPUT 'worksiteShare'

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway3" name="Exclusive Gateway"/>

        <endEvent id="endevent4" name="End"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow23" sourceRef="exclusivegateway3" targetRef="endevent4">
            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${!worksiteShareFound}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow24" sourceRef="exclusivegateway3" targetRef="buildList">
            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${worksiteShareFound}</conditionExpression>

        <scriptTask id="findTmp" name="Find Tmp Folder" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//List the OneDrive share root to find tmp folder
//If the tmp fodler exists, stop the process

//INPUT: 'oneDriveShare'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.GET
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.POST
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get the OneDrive share
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

def oneDriveJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("oneDriveShare"))
def oneDriveId = oneDriveJson.get('id')


//List root of OneDrive share
pointflow.request( GET, JSON ) {
    uri.path = '/apidoc/folders/list/' + oneDriveJson.get('id')
    uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey]
    println("URI " + uri)

    response.success = {rootResp, rootJson ->
        println("success resp:" + rootJson)

        def rootListJson = rootJson['RESPONSE']['RESULT']

        def tmpFolder = rootListJson.find{ folder -> folder.type == "DIR" && folder.name == "tmp" }

        if (tmpFolder == null){
            execution.setVariable('tmpFolderFound', false)

        } else {
            execution.setVariable('tmpFolderFound', true)
        }


    }

    response.failure = { rootResp ->
        println("failure resp:" + rootResp)
        execution.setVariable('tmpFolderFound', false)
    }
    
}

//OUTPUT: 'tmpFolderFound'

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <exclusiveGateway id="exclusivegateway4" name="Exclusive Gateway"/>

        <scriptTask id="createTmp" name="Create Tmp Folder" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//Create the tmpFolder

//INPUT: 'oneDriveShare'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.POST
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.*
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get the OneDrive Share
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")

def oneDriveJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("oneDriveShare"))

//def jsonBody = new JsonBuilder()
	
//println("jsonBody " + jsonBody.toString())

def http = new HTTPBuilder(pointflowInstance)

http.request(POST, URLENC){
  uri.path = '/apidoc/folders/create/' + oneDriveJson.get('id')
  uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey]
  println("URI " + uri)

  body = [containerid: '/',path: '/',foldername: 'tmp']
  println("BODY " + body)

/*
  response.success = {rootResp, rootJson ->
        println("success resp:" + rootJson)
    }

    response.failure = { rootResp ->
        println("failure resp:" + rootResp)
    }
    */
}

//OUTPUT: ''

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow27" sourceRef="findTmp" targetRef="exclusivegateway4"/>

        </sequenceFlow>

        <scriptTask id="deleteTmp" name="Delete Tmp Folder" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//Delete the tmpFolder

//INPUT: 'tmpFolder'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.DELETE
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get the tmpFolder info
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

def tmpFolderJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("tmpFolder"))

//List root of OneDrive share
pointflow.request( DELETE, JSON ) {
    uri.path = '/apidoc/folders/delete/' + tmpFolderJson.get('shareid')
    uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey, containerid:tmpFolderJson.get("containerid").toString(), path:tmpFolderJson.get("path").toString()]
    println("URI " + uri)

    response.success = {rootResp, rootJson ->
        println("success resp:" + rootJson)
    }

    response.failure = { rootResp ->
        println("failure resp:" + rootResp)
    }
    
}

//OUTPUT: ''

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow32" sourceRef="deleteTmp" targetRef="endevent1"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow33" sourceRef="deleteMatterWorklist" targetRef="saveTmp"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow34" sourceRef="exclusivegateway4" targetRef="emailStarted">
            <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${!tmpFolderFound}</conditionExpression>
        </sequenceFlow>
        <scriptTask id="saveTmp" name="Save Tmp Folder" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:autoStoreVariables="false">
            <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//List the OneDrive share root to find tmp folder
//If the tmp fodler exists, stop the process

//INPUT: 'oneDriveShare'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.GET
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get the OneDrive share
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

def oneDriveJson = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("oneDriveShare"))
def oneDriveId = oneDriveJson.get('id')


//List root of OneDrive share
pointflow.request( GET, JSON ) {
    uri.path = '/apidoc/folders/list/' + oneDriveJson.get('id')
    uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey]
    println("URI " + uri)

    response.success = {rootResp, rootJson ->
        println("success resp:" + rootJson)

        def rootListJson = rootJson['RESPONSE']['RESULT']

        def tmpFolder = rootListJson.find{ folder -> folder.type == "DIR" && folder.name == "tmp" }

        if (tmpFolder == null){
            execution.setVariable('tmpFolderFound', false)

        } else {
            execution.setVariable('tmpFolderFound', true)
            execution.setVariable("tmpFolder", JsonOutput.toJson(tmpFolder))
        }

    }

    response.failure = { rootResp ->
        println("failure resp:" + rootResp)
        execution.setVariable('tmpFolderFound', false)
    }
    
}

//OUTPUT: 'tmpFolder'

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
        </scriptTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow35" sourceRef="saveTmp" targetRef="deleteTmp"/>
    </process>
